author: Ciaran Mullooly
title: Ó Muircheartaigh urges those cocooning to stay active
description: Legendary commentator Mícheál Ó Muircheartaigh has launched a campaign to encourage people who are cocooning at home to get out into their garden and exercise more during the Covid-19 pandemic.
content:
Legendary commentator Mícheál Ó Muircheartaigh has launched a campaign to encourage people who are cocooning at home to get out into their garden and exercise more during the Covid-19 pandemic.
Mr Ó Muircheartaigh, who will be 90 years old this year, said he… [+1626 chars]
